title: Supportive Cancer Care with Chinese Medicine
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito Supportive Cancer Care with Chinese Medicine Cho, W. 1ª Edición Marzo 2010 Inglés Tapa dura 390 pags 1000 gr 16 x 24 x 3 cm ISBN 9789048135547 Editorial SPRINGER LIBRO IMPRESO 207,99 €197,59 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 2 a 3 semanas About this book - Presents state-of-the-art knowledge on supportive cancer care with Chinese unparallel topics of interest in supportive medicine - Examines important as more and more on supportive cancer care with Chinese medicine and its utility in improving cancer management as an ultimate goal This book provides a comprehensive coverage and a succinct overview of the current status of supportive cancer care with Chinese medicine written by leading experts in the field. The chapters coherently present an overview on the major treatment approaches of Chinese medicine and progresses made with different important aspects on supportive cancer care acupuncture, herbal Moreover, there are reviews on the side effects, as well as pain control with Chinese medicine. In order to provide information from basic science at the bench to the bedside, modern researches and clinical evaluation a herb-drug interactions are the main concerns of using Chinese medicine combined with western medicine. A chapter will expound on these issues and there will also be chapters discussing integrative Chinese and Western medicine, as well as cancer prevention with Chinese medicine. This book presents state-of-the-art knowledge on supportive cancer care with Chinese medicine, which will appeal to anyone involved in cancer care.
